text:
Today we're learning English with Disney's 
newest animation Raya and The Last Dragon.

Don't worry if you haven't seen this movie yet. 
The clips that we've chosen for today's lesson

contain no spoilers, so you can keep watching.
And if you do you are going to learn lots

of connected speech, which is the way that we 
connect and link words together in English,

and you'll learn phrasal verbs that you can 
use in daily conversations and much more!

But before we begin let's check out what Parvin 
says about our lessons. He says that he recommends

our channel to anyone that wants to learn natural 
English because this is what we do every week.

We make lessons to help you learn fast natural 
English without getting lost, without missing

the jokes and without subtitles. So make sure you 
hit that Subscribe Button and the Bell down below

to join our community and Parvin, and make 
sure you don't miss any of our new lessons.

In our Fluent with Friends Course we teach 
you important grammar tips just like this one,

so that you can avoid making mistakes.
Of course in addition to learning

thousands of words we use in our everyday 
speech, understanding fast speaking natives,

using correct pronunciation and 
laughing along with all the jokes.

The best part is you can try it right 
now for FREE with our 3 Mini Lessons.

Just click up here or down in the description 
box below to learn more and sign up now.

Before we continue learning 
with this incredible movie,

and if you want to learn more about how 
we connect and link our words togethe,r

to help you understand fast native speech 
and also to speak more naturally and fluently

I highly recommend you check out this 
lesson we made over on our other channel.

You can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch that next.
